name: MurderLands - The Lost Prototype
description:
Works best on new 2DS XL / new 3DS / new 3DS XL official hardware (install the cia via homebrew is recommended).

Better framerate, controls, and draw-distance on "new 3DS" family of systems.

CITRA HAS MAD ISSUES WITH THE MAIN MENU'S SOUND BUT GAMEPLAY IS FINE ON SOME DEVICES
